Html:
Hi everybody.

I´ve worked with NFOP is a great option, but there have a problem, multi threading is not supported.

Do you know if FO.NET could be used in multi threading?

I'm new with  this library.

Thanks

Hi

I remember that we fixed some bugs regarding multi-threading when the product was known as Apoc. I think you will be OK, but cannot guarantee it.

Cheers
Mark

Thanks Mark, i´ll make a stress test to try it and i'll let you know.

kind regards

artguedo wrote:

Thanks Mark, i´ll make a stress test to try it and i'll let you know.

kind regards

Any results yet that you could share on your stress test? - Thanks', Wolfgang

Hi Wolfgang, i've made the stress test and it works fine in multi-threading.

My hardware is:

Windows2008R2 x64 (Virtual Machine with VirtualBox)
2GB RAM
2 Procesors

XML fetched from MSSQLServer
XSL fetched from MSSQLServer and keep in memory

Class called in WS (asmx)

Stress with SOAP-UIx64
5 min
10 users
10 threads

Total 724 PDF's, two images in each page, 5 pages per PDF. Near of 2.4 files per second.

Regards
Thanks for posting your results! Very helpful.
